channel.title: Set a lvl that you get cape(still need help, 8 replies are different question)
channel.description:
how u make it so at level 145 they get cape? and not every time after 99?
and max hp is 145 but can heal at random parts? stopped at 113 and 135
ignore things below... other questions

any help?

ignore all above

item.title: Set a lvl that you get cape(still need help, 8 replies are different question)
item.dc:creator: @barelypassing barelypassing
item.description:
@barelypassing wrote:

		int combatLevel = 0;
		if (ran > attstr) {
			combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.37) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 0.4875));
		} else if (mag > attstr) {
			combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.37) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 0.4875));			
			} else {
			combatLevel = (int)(((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[1])) * 0.37) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) * 0.25) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) * 0.125) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) * 0.325) + ((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])) * 0.325));
		}

To change all 99’s to make combat 138. Search “combat xp” in client.java to find the max lvl thing…

Read full topic
